Description: Fragment of flattened handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '1̣5̣.'. Name Aristeidas. Common stamp; an example from the Athenian Agora uses the same die.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (61)
